com.olliebown.beads.core
Class BeadArray

java.lang.Object
  com.olliebown.beads.core.Bead
      com.olliebown.beads.core.BeadArray

public class BeadArray
extends Bead

A BeadArray is an array of Beads (wow!), but also a subclass of Bead. Its purpose is to forward commands to its array members.

Author:
ollie
